arm_group.description: Riluzole 50 mg orally twice per day

brief_summary.textblock:
This randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel group study will evaluate the
      safety and efficacy of riluzole in patients with PTSD. Patients will be randomized to
      receive either riluzole 50mg twice per day or placebo orally for 8 weeks as outpatient, with
      a 4-week open-label period.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study Of Riluzole In Patients With Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD)
